txt.en: 'A few dwarves went on ahead, though I begged them not to. It is too dangerous to the west. I gave them a warning, but I am not here to argue with them. I am here to win this war. I would appreciate it if you would search for them. The last I heard they had found a cave under a statue. Drenghól I think it was called. I am sure they could use assistance. They are behind enemy lines, after all!'
Drenghól can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should journey to Drenghól.
Drenghól can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should talk to Zádokh Flint-eye at Drenghól.
The Gabil'akkâ has secured Drenghól in Elderslade.

'How did you know that we were here, [placeholder]?! Oh, Náth told you? I suppose that is all right then, as we captured  Zudramdân together. A few of us went on to establish this small but very well hidden encampment. What do you think? Yes, it is quite well hidden!\n\n'We are scouting the outer walls of Gundabad. Will you assist us? Good, good!'
This hidden cave gives those a chance to safely scout the outer walls of Gundabad

'Did you find any hidden entrances into Gundabad or any weaknesses in the enemies defences? Nor did I! Bah, between these well organized Orcs and impeccable dwarf-craft, we are up against quite an enemy force here!'
The dwarves at Drenghól have asked you to scout the forces gathered near the outer walls of Gundabad.\n\nYou should assist the dwarves at Drenghól.
Drenghól can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should talk to Zádokh Flint-eye at Drenghól.
Talk to Zádokh Flint-eye at Drenghól
Talk to Zádokh Flint-eye at Drenghól
